parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: Additional message-specific information defined by the application

title: ISldWorks.PostMessageToApplicationx64
description: Posts a message to the application that invoked this method in 64-bit applications.
signature:
void PostMessageToApplicationx64( 
   System.Int32
Cookie
,
   System.Int64
UserData
)

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: Additional message-specific information defined by the application

remarks: This method is only available through early binding and with 64-bit versions of the SOLIDWORKS Design software.
